hero.title: TESLA RENT A CAR
hero.description: Experience the luxury and innovation of electric driving. Discover the ultimate driving experience with Tesla vehicles – a blend of technology, comfort, and eco-responsibility. Rent your Tesla now and enjoy uncompromised performance with a modern design.

model3.title: Tesla Model 3
model3.description: Tesla Model 3 – A blend of performance and efficiency. Speed, innovation, and premium design in one vehicle. Enjoy an exceptional electric driving experience with long-range autonomy and advanced technologies that make every moment unforgettable.

modelS.title: Tesla Model S
modelS.description: Tesla Model S – Elegance and power in perfect balance. Enjoy top-tier performance, luxurious design, and the latest technology. With long range, fast charging, and innovative features, Model S redefines driving with unparalleled comfort and safety.

steps.step1: Choose the Tesla Model that suits your needs.
steps.step2: Check available dates and book your Tesla.

whyTesla.title: Why Tesla Rent a Car
whyTesla.description: Customize your trip to your schedule and enjoy complete flexibility during your drive while experiencing the unique thrill of driving an electric car.

makeReservationHeader.title: To make reservations you need to be registed in our system

confirmReservation.title: Confirm your reservation
confirmReservation.subtitle: Enter your reservation ID, select a picture of your pay slip and confirm your reservation. It is necessary to pay a deposit via a payment slip or in person

paymentSlipRequirements.title: Payment slip requirements
paymentSlipRequirements.one: 1. Subject: Payment for reservation with ID: #####

confirmReservation.confirmingRes: By confirming your reservation, you agree to our terms and conditions.

footer.infoTwo: Activity and Activity Code: 7711 - Rental and Leasing of Cars and Light Motor Vehicles
